description: Bob Eschino, president and co-founder of Incredibles, an edible manufacturing company in Denver, Colorado, holds one of the company's signature chocolate bars infused with 100mg of THC. (Jessie Wardarski | NEWS21).
Crystal Atencio of Incredibles grabs a plate of baked chocolate bars infused with marijuana and knocks it from its mold, preparing it to be packaged and labeled. (Jessie Wardarski | News21).
Crystal Atencio of Incredibles holds a chocolate bar infused with 250mg of THC. (Jesse Wardarski | News21).
Bob Eschino, president and co-founder of Incredibles, looks at the label of one of his company's edible marijuana products in Denver, Colorado.  (Jessie Wardarski| News21).
Partner and Executive Chef at Incredibles, Joshua Fink, holds a THC infused GUM e. (Jessie Wardarski | News21).
Bob Eschino holds a refrigerated batch of concentrate made at his edible manufacturing company, Incredibles. (Jessie Wardarski | News21).
Bob Eschino looks into an oven at his edible manufacturing company in Denver, Colorado. (Jessie Wardarski |News21).
A sheet of marijuana oil extract waits for processing at Incredibles extract room in Denver, Colorado. (Jessie Wardarski | News21).
